document_data.name: Kalil yi Tulmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Kalil yi Tulmon''' was a pirate in service of the [[Rundeen]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kalil usually acted as first mate on pirate ships of the Rundeen fleet out of [[Almraiven]], [[Suldophor]], and [[Theymarsh]]. He was loyal first and foremost to the Rundeen, sometimes over the ship's captain. Kalil was also a cruel men, deceiving  sailors to convince them to surrender and afterward cruelly killing them in front of their fellows. Sometimes he was specifically chosen to "teach a lesson" to a particular merchant.
